ProductInfo.Features:
GW3008H: 8 channel 960H/FD1 video input DVR; 8 full channel real-time recording & playback; Support HDMI/VGA/BNC/SPOT/Loop; Support 3G Network Access; Support PTZ, Manual Alarm, Alarm In/Out
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft. IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
GW115H: Professional 1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Vandal proof IR Dome Camera, 700 TV lines, 36 LEDs, 98.4 feet IR Distance, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. 0.001 Lux
Package Includes: GW3008HD DVR with 2T HDD; 3xGW30WD-1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera; 3xGW115H-1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Indoor Camera; GWLED19IN-Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 1x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC
Package Includes:1xGW100CAW:100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 3xGW60CAW:60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1xGW25CAW:25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1x12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras; 1xGW128CA:1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHE8 8-Channel 960H DVR with 6 x 1/3 Inches Exview HAD CCD II 700 TVL 2.8~12mm Varifocal IR LED 3x36 Security Camera System with LED (Black and Grey)
